post:
[KMS-Hosting.com](https://www.kms-hosting.com) offers hosting solutions from Shared Webhosting to Dedicated Servers since 2012. We operate our own hardware and Juniper based 10/40Gbit network (AS30823) within two datacenters in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

Our servers are based on HP Enterprise servers with Intel Xeon E5 CPUs, Hardware Raid, ECC Ram and 10Gbit Uplink each. Every webspaces comes with our award winning Inhouse DDoS-Protection which is based on years of research and development, mitigating even complex attacks up on layer7 like http floods.


**Our features:**

-Plesk Webinterface  
-PHP 5.6 / 7.0 and Python available  
-MySQL reachable from external  
-FTP / FTPS / SFTP Access  
-Mailserver with Webmail  
-Fast Raid 10 Storage  
-DDoS-Protection included  
-Performant 10Gbit Connectivity  
-Server-Hardware from HP Enterprise  
-Prepaid - No long term contracts

**Offers:**

**Cloud Web L - 2,49€ per month**  
-5120MB Diskspace  
-Unlimited Traffic  
-PHP 5.6 / 7.0  
-1 FTP Account  
-5 MySQL Databases  
-Unlimited Mail Accounts  


**Cloud Web XL - 4,79€ per month**  
-10240MB Diskspace  
-Unlimited Traffic  
-PHP 5.6 / 7.0 + Python  
-SFTP / SSH Access  
-5 FTP Accounts  
-10 MySQL Databases  
-Unlimited Mail Accounts 

More details can be found on [https://www.kms-hosting.com/webhosting](https://www.kms-hosting.com/webhosting).

Questions? Just send us a private message or email to contact@combahton.net.
